levels.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, and ranged attacks no longer deal reduced damage
<@ba.rem>Upon the second activation of this skill and afterwards, this skill has unlimited duration, and its bonuses are twice the base amount</>
